vision.notes: Mayflies in general have good vision, used for mate detection and predator avoidance. Given the wide distribution of Heptageniidae, vision is likely a key sense. Further research is needed to characterize specific adaptations in this family.

mechanoreception.notes: As aquatic insects, Heptageniidae likely rely on mechanoreception to detect water currents and vibrations for prey detection and predator avoidance.

chemoreception.notes: Chemoreception is important for aquatic insects to locate food sources and suitable oviposition sites. Likely present in Heptageniidae.
